page.title: 14NICOLA'S HOBBIES
page.content: Nicola is a pupil at Robinsons End Middle School. "My favourite hobbies are dancing and cooking.Every Saturday I go dancing at the Ace Dance Centre.I go with Heidi and Claire.You have to have a leotard and skirt.I also practise a lot at home when I have time.I'm very keen on dancing,and my teacher is nice too. Every Sunday,when my mum makes the dinner,she lets me make some cakes or a pie for pudding.When I was little my mum let me play with the leftover pastry,and I used to throw it against the wall,and I used to get told off.When it's near Christmas I make a load of mince pies,and I also help my mum make the Christmas cake."
